extDesr.message: Manage your Chrome extensions by one-touch. Simple, safe & resource-saving.

speedManageDesc.message: Double-click the blank area of the popup window to close all extensions(except for themes & locked extensions)

speedManageLock.message: Click the icon to lock/unlock the extension:

uninstallDesc.message: Right-click a certain extension icon in the popup window to uninstall it.

otherDesc.message: Give stars or advice on Chrome Webstore. Your concern will encourage the developer to improve it :-)

showBadgeDesc.message: Displays the number of extensions currently enabled (except for locked extents)
